website_summaries.verdict: The spoon rest provides ultimate efficiency by offering notches to hold other utensils alongside your spoon.
pros: 4 notches allow users to rest multiple utensils at once
Drip pad keeps counters clean from dirty spoons
Heat-safe silicone offers a non-slip product
cons: Notches a little too thin for some

customer_reviews.title: Very small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Much much smaller than I thought. The photo is deceptive. Even my rubber spatula like the one in their photo nearly hangs off the edge. Utensils also have to go in sideways because most handles are too wide. It stays sturdily on the counter and is an easy rubber /silicone material to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit! not the real product
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of the real Tomorrow's Kitchen Silicone Utensil Rest and the one I received (actually I ordered 2) is not in any way similar to the real product! First, it is plastic and not silicone; Second, it is a lot smaller; and 3rd it is not practical at all. I wonder if Amazon knows they are distributing counterfeit products!
customer_reviews.author: Huda M. Ayas

customer_reviews.title: Stained after the first usage
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this as it failed on the first usage. Who wants a stained spoon holder on the counter. It was just oil from cooking chicken and it totally failed to clean up after repeated washing.
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Oconnell

customer_reviews.title: Completely surprised
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how I would like this as I am used to the "old fashion" spoon rest. I must say though, this product is amazing! Fits multiple utensils and cleans up in a snap! A HUGE plus is no one can break it (which is why I had to buy this in the first place). Seriously though, this is a great invention and product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ateammamaof4

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s on my countertop & in constant use. I never realized how much I needed a multi-utensil rest, until I bought this one on a whim. I like it so much I bought 5 more for stocking stuffers for the adults in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea! I used this for the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! I used this for the first time last night while making tacos. Since this rest holds the tool by it's handle, you're not just smearing food all over it like the dish I used to use. In fact, I was able to use it through cooking the entire meal and never got anything on the actual utensil rest. Great idea for sure. The space between the holders perfectly fit the two tools I used and made it very easy to secure them on the stand and remove them when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W.

customer_reviews.title: No more mess
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's one of those simple ideas that you wonder why no one thought of before. I hated that utensils always fell off my traditional spoon holder. Who cooks with just one utensil? This keeps everything in place, catches the drips and cleans super easy. I have put four utensils in it with ease and it keeps the mess off the counter. I love it so much I'm buying one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moser

customer_reviews.title: This product seemed really cool but it ended up not quite suiting my needs
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed really cool but it ended up not quite suiting my needs. All my cooking utensils have handles thicker than the slots in the rest will allow, so I can't use it in the way the image shows, nor can I place as many utensils in the rest as I would like. I also wish they had more decorative colors available as it's quite plain. That said, it's cool that it's so easy to clean and it arrived as described.
customer_reviews.author: Lina H.

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff. Not real product.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 of these and gotten bad quality knockoffs from China.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Cordova

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be perfect. And so it is
customer_reviews.text: I have a oval utensil rest holder but I could only fit one maaybe two utensils on it. I noticed that I kept getting a paper plate to put the rest of my utensils on when I was cooking so when I came across this, I thought this would be perfect. And so it is!!! Granted the thick bulky handle utensils just needs to be turned to the side to snug in the holder but it still serves the purpose!!! I'd recommend it to friends and/or family members :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Verlengia

customer_reviews.title: Need better colors. And what is the "limited edition" at > 3x the price?
customer_reviews.text: This utensil rest works fine for me. I agree with what others are saying about the width of the slots and the size, but I understood those drawbacks from the vendor's photos and video and the description. Grey and Puke Green are terrible color options, but thankfully with the product's flexibility, I can store it in my utensil drawer when not in use. (I would have liked red.) I really wonder who would buy the $25.48 "limited edition" choice given the description and images are the same as the less-expensive ($6.48 and $7.29) products.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher Safe/Heat Safe
customer_reviews.text: I keep this spoon rest on the top of my stove 24/7. I don't have to go looking for one in the middle of cooking. It's always available. Even after cooking 3 dishes on the stove and something in the oven, it hasn't deformed or melted. It is super easy to clean either by hand in the sink or just throw it in the dishwasher. I've washed it at least 50 times and it still looks as good as the day I bought it. No having to work about breaking it. It's simple and effective. It may not be artistically designed, but it does it's job well and holds up to the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jordan K

customer_reviews.title: GENIUS
customer_reviews.text: I've never been more excited to receive an item from Amazon. Whoever invented this.. is a genius. From the silicone.. to the layout.. just everything. This makes my life easier and being a germaphobe.. I'm so happy with this.. more people should know about it
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Martini

customer_reviews.title: Great design and super useful
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to my kitchen. Before, I was using a traditional spoon rest that was designed for only one spoon. If I used more than one spoon, they just stacked up and looked messy (and shared food with each other). This design can hold several utensils and keep them tidy. It also has the added bonus of keeping ingredients separate, since the spoons don't have to rest on each other (I like to keep my spooning in the bedroom or the couch, not the kitchen). Great product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Martin

customer_reviews.title: Effective solution for holding cooking utensils
customer_reviews.text: The silicone of the product cleans very easily which is a plus. However it is a bit small, and the fact that the holding areas are straight up and down means that if you'd like it to hold a spatula you can fit on one more straight necked spoon. And with a ladle it's basically impossible to fit anything else on at the same time. This isn't necessarily a deal breaker, but it makes it difficult to cook more than a couple things at once, for instance if you want to have your ladle for a pasta sauce and a spoon for stirring your pasta it's not very possible to keep both off your stove or counter with this.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Not Silicone
customer_reviews.text: Ordered product based on description and picture. Neither are correct! Hard plastic, NOT silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Tuell

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great product
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised but there is one thing I don't like about it. The notches where the spoons and spatulas rest are so narrow, the tools rest at an angle. As a result, whatever is left on your implement slides off onto the silicon mat. This means you will have to carry this to the sink to rinse it every time you cook. Not a huge deal, but if the notches were wider, some tools could rest there without spilling food on it. Other than that, this is a cromulent spoon rest.
customer_reviews.author: R. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Luxury kitchen gadget on the cheap
customer_reviews.text: Having used spoon holders before which never seemed to hold the variety of kitchen equipment I use, I was very pleased to find the fit and function of this kitchen rest was fantastic. It fits big and small utensils easily, and the wide runway for spillage was very much appreciated for saucier cooks. I recommend this to anyone who cooks. It cleans easy and can be stashed if you don't prefer the look of a silicone rest in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Buds007

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!!
customer_reviews.text: This ids the perfect rest. i had not been able to find anythig that would sit evenly on my gas stove top and was constantly fighting with different rests to balance. This is terrific, small enough that it doesn't take up half the stove top, but able to sit flat and not slide around. Great!
customer_reviews.author: tdpuph

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but effective
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items that's incredibly simple, but incredibly effective. It's just a chunk of silicon with grooves in it, but it's made keeping the oven clean much easier. I've got an old stove that has a constant pilot light which makes the surface pretty hot even when not in use, and effectively bakes on any spill in no time, and this little thing has prevented a surprising amount of cleanup and singed fingers. I'm irrationally attached to my gray chunk of silicon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew E McBride

customer_reviews.title: Super Useful
customer_reviews.text: I really wish this came in other colors (i.e. black), but for functionality, this thing is great. I love that I can sit more than one utensil down while cooking. It actually seems a bit cleaner than an ordinary spoon rest. It washes easily and is durable. Even though it doesn't add to the decor, I can't see myself changing it out for one that does.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Critelli

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't hold tongs so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have it next to my air-fryer because I need tongs to get chicken wings and boigers out of the instant-pot air fryer appliance. The grooves are too thin to use for my tongs. I have to use it for my wooden stirrers and ladles. It's OK, but not earthshakingly good. I have a little oblong ceramic bowl to rest those items I mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tirebiter

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Spoon Rest Ever
customer_reviews.text: This spoon rest is amazing. The grooves are great for propping up different utensils at the same time. It doesn't mind heat. It is super easy to clean and has never had any issues handling sauces, grease or anything else that I dribbled, dropped or slung on it. It has never stained and is holding up very durably. I can't imagine ever needing or wanting any other type of spoon rest after using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My husband always picked on me when our little one spoon holder that sits on the oven was full of kitchen utensils while cooking.... and getting a mess everywhere. This holds all cooking utensils used to make a dinner. And doesn’t leave a mess on your counter or oven! Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great kitchen tool.  I use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very disorganized cook, and this is a kitchen tool I’ve needed for a long time. I even got 2, one to hold utensils that have handled raw food, and one that I use after the food is sufficiently cooked. The only thing better would’ve been if they offered them in more than one color so I could easily tell which is which ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: FGraceS

customer_reviews.title: Careful when you lift it up
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can put four spoons on this. It's easy to clean. What I don't like is when you lift it up, it's limp and all the drippings it caught pour out onto the counter and floor. You pretty much have to put a small bread board or plate under it so you can lift it up and take it to the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Keek, An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you have a small kitchen or countertop.  Can easily hold a few spatulas, spoons, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be flimsy rubber/plastic, but it effectively holds a few cooking utensils: spatulas, spoons, etc. The color is lightish gray and I keep mine on the stove all the time when I'm cooking. I just wash it when I do the dishes and it comes out perfectly cleans. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase and is exactly as described. I am super happy with the product and it has held up well to washing and use. I like that it has multiple slots multiple as I rarely am using just one spoon when cooking. Also, there is plenty of room for the spoon to rest and a lip around the edge that keeps any liquids from getting on your counters.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I managed without it
customer_reviews.text: I'm no gourmet chef but this makes managing cooking much easier as I no longer find myself balancing utensils on the edges of pots and pans. They make a larger one that I wish I would have got instead. It cleans easily and seems very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: A Snap To Clean, The Notches Are Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second spoon/utensil rest, and now it's moved on over to a permanent place on my stove. I like the multiple notches for when I'm cooking in a few pots and pans at the same time. Plus, it's silicone so it just rinses clean in a second. Great kitchen item.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Works okay!
customer_reviews.text: I was very tired of using plates or napkins to lay down my cooking things all of the time it’s messy and gross at times but this thing is very convenient. Wish it was a bit larger length wise as some larger soup spoons or wisks will hang off of the edge but none the less it’s a handy kitchen tool for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It's great! Specially if you're cooking 3 different things at ...
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this. It's great! Specially if you're cooking 3 different things at the same time like me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mar De Li Word

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: The item is very small ... the grease on it you have to use a lot of soup to properly clean it. And since the item is small 4 spoons on it looks clumsy and they are not that apart from each other so try to put the ones that the condiment won’t suffer flavor alteration if you mixed it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone who cooks!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Normally I just place a folded paper towel on the counter, and my more messy meals tend to leave residue on the counter as the paper towels get soaked through. I always use several utensils while cooking, so this thing really works well for me. I highly recommend to anyone. Heck, might even get me a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Gillingham

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to help prevent messes when cooking. It is so useful to have especially when you are cooking with multiple utensils. It keeps them off of the countertop and prevents a further mess from happening. It is pretty easy to clean as well. It is something you might not know you need that you really do need. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy no Sandy Candy
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in a camp store for $24.99 and thought hmm, that seems a little pricey. A quick check here and it was at my home before I returned from my trip. Works well, easy to clean, and mitigates the yuck factor of laying down utensils in camp tables.
customer_reviews.author: Texsox

customer_reviews.title: So simple, so useful
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those simple little widgets you can’t believe you didn’t invent yourself. It’s just a one-piece silicone booster with notches and a drip bib to hold up your spoons, tongs, etc. while you cook. Just big enough to do the job, and washes off in the sink in a second when you’re done. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Riley

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: You really can only put 2 utensils at a time on it. Well regular things like a spatula and spoon. You could fit four forks or something on it. It needs to be space farther apart and a little larger to accommodate more than 2 utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this. Works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Works exactly as expected, even with larger spatulas and scrapers. Cleans easily (hand wash - don't have a dishwasher) even when some BBQ sauce was left overnight on it. Haven't had any tomato sauce dry on it, but wet sauce washes off and after about 2 weeks of daily use it looks exactly like new. Would totally recommend/purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Dookwah

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: Probably could be a bit bigger, but I've never really had any over splatter , so it's hard for me to say that's an issue. Nice little pads on the bottom that keep from moving. Cleans well. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: oioi123

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've thrown this product in the dishwasher after wiping grease and other spills off. It's extremely easy to clean and my messy cook counterpart contains some of his mess to this product making my kitchen less of a mess! Major win!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this spoon rest. I can leave it out on the counter without it looking out of place in my kitchen. I can put multiple utensils on it. when I'm done cooking I just throw it in the dishwasher. Overall I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this little guy. Easy to plop a spatula down on and prevents any mess. I feel like this is much more modern and space saving as compared to the giant spoon shaped ones. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Handiest spoon/utensil rest I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I love this utensil rest. It keeps all the utensils separate when I'm cooking. It is pliable to any surface. It doesn't slide or move, the grip is excellent. The best part is clean-up, SO EASY! Literally anything I've cooked with and dripped on it slides right off with my sprayer, no scrubbing at all. Have also thrown in the dishwasher to test, top rack, with no issues. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: wfairley

customer_reviews.title: SO USEFUL....ELIMINATES MESS
customer_reviews.text: Use and toss in the DW....definitely eliminates the mess of spatulas, spoons, etc. No problem leaving it "out" to use. Holds the utensils upright or on their side, whichever position you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Utensil Rest
customer_reviews.text: I have determined that I don't care for silicone trivets or spoon rest after using this product. However, putting preference aside I would say this is a handy and unique cook accessory. It helps to keep the counter clean and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened this my wife said, I know what that is, snatched it from my hands and put it ti use!
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Handy on meal prep day!
customer_reviews.text: Love using this on meal prep days or just to cook a single meal. I can wipe it down or throw it in the dishwasher. Best suited for thinner spoons but I’ve made soup ladles work.
customer_reviews.author: K. Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Accommodates multiple utensils
customer_reviews.text: The days of running out of spoon-rest space are over! I haven't found a spoon or spatula laid directly on the counter since I bought this, and nothing ever sticks to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bitney

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is not durable at all. Stick to the old school and buy something more durable and perhaps made of hard plastic or metal. Beware that it doesn't hold any heavy cooking utensils as depicted in the picture. It's flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.text: What a simple but excellent design. If you like to cook then you know the mess the wooden spoons make, or what ever cooking utensils you use. This eliminates the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this utensil holder. The typical spoon rest never worked well for me because when cooking multiple things at a time I didn't want the spoons to touch. This handy thing separates all my utensils while cooking. I simply toss it on the top shelf of the dishwasher and it comes out sparkling clean. Wish I would have found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this product is flexible and light, so it's easy to clean compared to other products made out of metal or glass. I also love the fact that you can put multiple utensils in one when you're cooking multiple dishes at once!
customer_reviews.author: Zernette Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to clean and fits all my cooking utensils ranging from chopsticks to blasters. Keeps my unavoidable messess contained for a cleaner stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: No Stick
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing is how easy it is to clean. Nothing gets stuck even if you forget to grab it off the stove top during the nightly dishes. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: dwnncl

customer_reviews.title: Put your spoon here
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it keeps gunk from splattering on my counter while I'm cooking and it doesn't break like porcelain. That's what I wanted. That's what I got.
customer_reviews.author: jellydonut25

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Wife approves!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because I was sick of her making a mess on our countertops. I love the silicone material it is made from and it’s very easy to clean. The slots for multiple utensils is very helpful as well!
customer_reviews.author: GParks14

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product to fit a big need for people who like to cook. My stove is much cleaner now that I have a place to put spoons, etc. while cooking and easier than trying to figure out where I left the spoon or spatula. Easy to clean and is sturdy. Am buying more for little Holiday presents, everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: I like mine, but it doesn't work for everything.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really clever device and makes it easy to use several utensils and put them down without messing the counter. The only problem I have had is with larger/curved utensils like ladles and some spatulas. There isn't enough room between the slots for things like that. So, I have another spoon rest for those. Also, using all the slots requires making sure the utensils don't touch each other and transfer sauce or other food to each other.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Need a utensil holder for our kitchen and found this and was super happy that it can hold more than one utensil. Easy to clean and love the drip tray.
customer_reviews.author: EVO

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a few spatulas on the rest. I see no point to having 4 spaces if the max you can put on this is 2 utensils the max! It's not bad but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for new cook
customer_reviews.text: New 20-something on his own and starting to cook. Needs lots of beyond the basic kitchen equipment. He really liked the design of this one.
customer_reviews.author: PCarter

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Simple utensil rest that does the job. One thing to note is that the slots are not super wide, so anything you put in will more than likely be resting sideways instead of flat, which is something to consider if you're wanting to use this mainly for spoons or spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: burnham48

customer_reviews.title: Low Profile, Convenient to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Low profile so it stays out of the way. Can rest a number of tools (tongs, spoons, spatulas, etc) at the same time. Easy to rinse and wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gant

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST utensil rest
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST utensil rest! I love being able to put down multiple utensils when I'm doing a 'gourmet' meal, and it's large enough for our over-sized turner as well. Not to mention it can be thrown in the dishwasher when needed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Quadri

customer_reviews.title: Friggin Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the best,,,easy to clean, holds several spoons and such at a time and of different sizes! Sent one to my sister as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marika C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Fits nicely on the stove and holds utensils while we are cooking. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: rwscls

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I wish it stayed put on my stove. the bottom sides are beveled which don't need to be. If they were flush, it would create a suction cup effect and it would keep it in place better.
customer_reviews.author: The Unbiased Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Mess be gone
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Love the no fuss, no mess option this brings to the stove top! Definitely would purchase again !
customer_reviews.author: Grace1964

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my paint brushes where I put them.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not its intended use, but I use this as a watercolor paint brush holder. Keeps them from rolling away while I'm painting and with something of the correct height under the handle keeps them at a slight downward angle for drying after I've cleaned them.
customer_reviews.author: LostinBoston

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: In the photo it appears the spoons or utensils dont touch the silicone but most of my utensils do touch. I was hoping to eliminate cleaning my spoon rest after eat meal. Only reason for 3 stars. Other wise it fits most things nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine but ended up getting another one we can use but just sitting utensils on them and not having to stand them on their side. This one works just fine though, and is good if you are limited on counter space.
customer_reviews.author: ceywden

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome utensil rest! Easy to clean. You can't not put your utensils here while cooking. Keeps them separate & your stovetop clean. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for my family. Holds spoons, forks, spatulas. easy to use and easy to clean,
customer_reviews.author: books

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This holder will hold any kitchen tool, spoon, or spatula. Sturdy and built to keep the handle down and the end up. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Bencowitz

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPOON REST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is designed to hold 4 tools. I use it all day long to set down messy items. I have even used it as a coaster when I was alone. Great 4 hole spoon rest, a good gadget.
customer_reviews.author: SGA

customer_reviews.title: Great utensil rest!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! No more nasty, spill-filled paper towels laying on the counters. Easy clean-up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: Keeps counters clean
customer_reviews.text: My wife makes a mess when she cooks by leaving spoons, ladels and spatulas on the counter. Sometimes she'll put a paper towel down but that still makes a mess. This keeps things clean and looks good doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Scaren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to, but is also super easy to clean! Even with dried food on it I just have to run some hot water over it for a little bit and it's all clean again.
customer_reviews.author: Newt Meador

customer_reviews.title: SO HANDY!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect to be so pleased! Product does exactly what it said it would do and makes for an easy, fast cleanup. I’m a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 to give 2 to my sisters. I always need more than one spoon rest, and though I have 2, this takes up less counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy in the Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I like this way better than the spoon holder I had before. It lets you rest multiple utensils on it without them touching each other. It also rinses off really well, or I just throw it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping my counter clean
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping my counter clean, and keeping the utensils from touching. Only issue I have found is that it comes out spotty from my dishwasher. Easy to wipe off though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it does what it says
customer_reviews.text: does what it says, but noticed it can only hold so much since the spoons will touch each other if they were side by side
customer_reviews.author: BJD

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for me. Functional. Has four slots for utensils and not the standard one. When cooking a meal you're using more than one utensil. Easy to clean which is always a plus. Try it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Blkwidow

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have two for my house and each member of my family has one (yay for functional functional Christmas gifts) everyone loves how wasy to clean it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: This Utensil Rest Won't Scratch Your Countertops!
customer_reviews.text: This unusual spoon rest is fantastic. It holds utensils quite easy, prevents messy drips on the counter and is easy to clean. I especially like that it's built for multiple utensils - who cooks with just one??
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.  Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: Much more user friendly than the standard spoon rest. Great if using more than one utensil at a time. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: tiasmom0707Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: 3 slotted spoon holder YES!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this silicons spoon rest!! Incredible! 3 slots for different utensils. Now if i could teach my kids to use it! A definite must buy
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much more logical to me than a ceramic or metal spoon rest that only holds one utensil and way cleaner than laying stuff on a paper towel which is what we always ended up doing when we cooked with more than one utensil. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Brunetti

customer_reviews.title: Not "soft" silicone...more like hard plastic.
customer_reviews.text: When I read "silicone", I thought it'd be a little more soft, and not feel like hard plastic, so for that I'm a little disappointed. But otherwise I'm sure it'll work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's super useful!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I never thought i needed a utensil rest until i got this. Its so good! im sure there are many like this but i have this one and i use it every day. It cleans easily and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: The_Chinaman

customer_reviews.title: So useful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! No spoons falling off spoon rests. Space for four spoons/spatulas/utensils at once. Won’t break. Easy to clean. Wish it came in decorative colors. But so useful, I’ll take it in gray.
customer_reviews.author: JayLynn

customer_reviews.title: best for spoons and rubber spatulas
customer_reviews.text: pancake turners (aka spatulas) are kind of too bulky to hold more than a couple
customer_reviews.author: mrobison

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. You just put stuff down on it, it really is that simple! Even if you are burning the crap out of your dinner, at least you don’t have to wipe the counter with this nifty little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Potter

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep kitchen clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty flexible material, seems durable so far, and is good for keeping the kitchen a little more organized
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle DeWolf

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as they describe it here. Very easy to clean. Works great
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyB

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this spatula holder. It’s easy to clean and the size it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Suarez

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend this product. A true value for the money and 100% functional.
customer_reviews.author: kristie l. kennington-otto

customer_reviews.title: The best in appearance utensil rest I have found!
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive and easy to clean utensil rest, and the grey color coordinates with my granite countertops. When I saw how great it is, I ordered another one for our vacation home.
customer_reviews.author: Beachrunner

product_meta.title: Tomorrow's Kitchen Silicone Utensil Rest, Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GrayThe Tomorrow's Kitchen Utensil Rest keeps your countertops clean and your utensils organized. This smart kitchen helper is made from non-slip silicone and is designed to hold multiple utensils at once. The raised notches offer a place for up to 4 cooking utensils at once and can even hold your spring-tongs in place! The raised edges keep spills contained on the rest, and not on your countertop. Available in green or gray.
feature_bullets: Keep counters clean and utensils organized with the Utensil Rest by Tomorrow's Kitchen (Formerly Vacu Vin)
Four notches hold up to 4 utensils at once, including spring tongs
Raised edges keep spills on the rest, and not on your surfaces
A perfect gift for all the chefs in your life
